snippet.title: CATAFALQUE™ - Prologue Gameplay
snippet.description:
Explore the unfamiliar world around you, filled with details and secrets to uncover, as you try to survive this modern take on the classic PSOne era survival horror masterpieces.
Try to piece together the macabre past and eerie present through item descriptions and environmental storytelling while holding on to whatever is left of your sanity.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
